namuth pashchath wiplawiya samajaya godanagima kiyana karanayedi wiplawaya asamath wuna eka thanak thiyenawa.ee thamayi rajyaya ha samajaya athara thibena sabadathawaya prajathanthrika kirimata wiplawaya asamath wima.wisheshayenma josaf stalinge nagimath ekka rajyaye adhikariwadi swabhawaya balawath wenna patan gannawa.stalin ha liyon trotski kiyana nayakan depala athara athiwuna wiwadayedi mathabhedayata lakwunu eka karanayak thamayi kalawe ha sahithyaye bhumikawa.widyawa wagema kalawath wenama wishayak bawa adahu trotski ema wishaya "kisidu balapamakin thorawa" wardhanaya wimata ida dena tharamata pragamanaya labana bawa prakasha kala.me anuwa kalawa sambandha rajya madihathwima athishaya awama ekak wiya yuthu bawayi ohu pawasuwe.namuth stalin eeta wenaswa samajawadi samajaya godanagime "upangayak" lesa kalawa yodagatha yuthu bawath,ema nisa kalawa sambandha rajyaya adhikariyaka awashyathawayath awadharanaya kala.
